work.name: Serbian AI Society
work.summary: Serbian AI Society is being launched in Serbia by the most prominent people in artificial intelligence, with one goal - networking and strengthening the domestic AI scene. The aim of this organization is to bring together all stakeholders dealing with this subject which will contribute to the presence and growth of artificial intelligence in Serbia.

highlights: AI · Data · Mentoring · PoC · Project Management
